cafetier.no_bounds: No boundary set. Update the boundary within the Management Desk menu.
cafetier.no_menu_items: No menu items found. Add food to display cases within the cafe.
cafetier.no_spawn_positions: No spawn positions found. Add more at least 10 blocks from the cafe boundary.
cafetier.update_schematic: Schematic created. Set the boundary and use on the desk to set the area.
